TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit MembershipUser extends System.Object

summary.span: 公开和更新成员资格数据存储中的成员资格用户信息。

span.span: Exposes and updates membership user information in the membership data store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象用于表示成员资格数据存储区中的单个成员身份用户。The object is used to represent a single membership user in the membership data store. 它将公开有关成员资格用户的信息（如电子邮件地址），并为成员资格用户提供功能，例如更改或重置其密码的功能。It exposes information about the membership user such as the email address, and provides functionality for the membership user such as the ability to change or reset his or her password. > [!NOTE] > 如果你不熟悉 ASP.NET 的成员资格功能，请参阅 "[成员资格简介](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/yh26yfzy(v=vs.100))"，然后继续。If you are not familiar with the membership features of ASP.NET, see [Introduction to Membership](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/yh26yfzy(v=vs.100)) before continuing. 有关与成员资格相关的其他主题的列表，请参阅[使用成员身份管理用户](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/tw292whz(v=vs.100))。For a list of other topics related to membership, see [Managing Users by Using Membership](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/tw292whz(v=vs.100)). 对象由 和 方法返回，或作为 、和 方法返回的 的一部分返回。A object is returned by the and methods or as part of a returned by the , , and methods. 当您想要更新现有成员资格用户的信息时， 方法需要 的对象。A object is required by the method when you want to update the information for an existing membership user. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将更新用户的电子邮件地址。The following code example updates the email address for a user. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个文本框，该文本框接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider/CS/UpdateEmailcs.aspx#11)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider/VB/UpdateEmailvb.aspx#11)]

summary.span: 使用指定的属性值创建新的成员资格用户对象。

span.span: Creates a new membership user object with the specified property values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建新的 对象不会将新的成员资格用户对象添加到成员资格数据存储区。Creating a new object does not add a new membership user object to the membership data store. 若要将新的成员资格用户添加到成员资格数据存储，请使用 方法。To add a new membership user to the membership data store, use the method. 请注意， 方法返回添加到数据存储区的成员资格用户的 对象。Note that the method returns a object for the membership user added to the data store. 对象可在应用程序代码中构造，以便与 方法一起使用。 objects can be constructed in application code for use with the method. 另外，还可以将从 、、、或 方法返回的 对象传递到 方法。Alternatively, you can also pass a object returned from the , , , , or method to the method as well. 对象通常由 、、、和 方法的成员资格提供程序实现构造。 objects are also commonly constructed by membership-provider implementations for the , , , , and methods. `name`、`email`和 `passwordQuestion` 参数都将在使用之前被剪裁。The `name`, `email`, and `passwordQuestion` parameters are all trimmed before being used. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现成员资格提供程序的 方法。The following code example shows an implementation of the method for a membership provider. 方法构造一个在用户成功添加到数据存储区时返回的 对象。The method constructs a object that is returned when the user is successfully added to the data store. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.Constructor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.Constructor/CS/newuser.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.Constructor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.Constructor/VB/newuser.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用 属性所引用的成员资格提供程序的 方法来更新成员资格数据存储区中成员资格用户的密码。 calls the method of the membership provider referenced by the property to update the password for the membership user in the membership data store. 成员资格提供程序可能对密码大小有限制。The membership provider may have restrictions on the size of the password. 有关大小限制，请参阅成员资格提供程序的文档。For size limitations, see the documentation for the membership provider. ## Examples 下面的代码示例修改了当前登录用户的密码。The following code example modifies the password for the current logged-on user. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个文本框，该文本框接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). span.span: Application-specific information for the membership user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可用于存储特定于应用程序的成员资格用户的自定义信息。The property can be used to store custom information for a membership user that is specific to an application. 的 属性中可存储的信息量由 属性所引用的成员资格提供程序定义。The amount of information that can be stored in the property for a is defined by the membership provider referenced by the property. 如果你的应用程序需要更多的空间来存储超过成员资格提供程序允许的用户信息，则可以实现自定义成员资格提供程序，或使用用户 。If your application requires more space to store user information than is allowed by the membership provider, you can implement a custom membership provider, or use the user .

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string GetPassword ();
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string GetPassword() cil managed
Public Overridable Function GetPassword () As String
public: virtual System::String ^ GetPassword();
abstract member GetPassword : unit -> string override this.GetPassword : unit -> string

summary.span: 从成员资格数据存储中获取成员资格用户的密码。

span.span: Gets the password for the membership user from the membership data store.
The password for the membership user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用 属性引用的成员资格提供程序的 方法，以便从成员资格数据存储区中检索成员身份的密码。 calls the method of the membership provider referenced by the property to retrieve the password for the membership from the membership data store. 如果 `false`，则成员资格提供程序将返回一个异常。If is `false`, the membership provider will return an exception. 如果提供程序支持 为 的密码，则您将无法检索成员资格用户的密码，应考虑在用户忘记其密码时使用 方法。If the provider supports passwords with a of , you will be unable to retrieve the password for the membership user and should consider making use of the method when a user has forgotten his or her password. > [!NOTE] > 如果 `enablePasswordRetrieval` 设置为 `true`，并在 ASP.NET 应用程序的 web.config 文件中 `passwordFormat` 设置为 `Hashed`，则会引发 。A will be thrown if `enablePasswordRetrieval` is set to `true` and `passwordFormat` is set to `Hashed` in the Web.config file for the ASP.NET application. 如果 `true`，则必须使用将密码答案作为参数的 重载，并为成员资格用户提供密码答案。If is `true`, you must use the overload that takes a password answer as a parameter and supply the password answer for the membership user. 如果需要密码答案并且提供了不正确的密码提示问题答案，则成员资格提供程序会引发 。If a password answer is required and an incorrect password answer is supplied, a is thrown by the membership provider. ## Examples 下面的代码示例调用 方法来检索指定用户名的密码。The following code example calls the method to retrieve the password for a specified user name. 密码将发送到用户的电子邮件地址。The password is sent to the user's email address. 请注意，假定 为 `false`。Note that is assumed to be `false`. > [!NOTE] > 对于需要高安全级别的站点，不建议使用电子邮件以明文形式返回密码。Returning a password in clear text using email is not recommended for sites that require a high level of security. 对于高安全性站点，建议使用加密（如 SSL）返回密码。For high-security sites, it is recommended that you return passwords using encryption, such as SSL. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个文本框，该文本框接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.MembershipUser#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.MembershipUser/CS/retrievepassword2cs.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.MembershipUser#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.MembershipUser/VB/retrievepassword2vb.aspx#3)]

param.span: 成员资格用户的密码答案。

summary.span: 从成员资格数据存储中获取成员资格用户的密码。

span.span: Gets the password for the membership user from the membership data store.
The password for the membership user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用 属性引用的成员资格提供程序的 方法，以便从成员资格数据存储区中检索成员资格用户的密码。 calls the method of the membership provider referenced by the property to retrieve the password for the membership user from the membership data store. 如果需要密码答案并且提供了不正确的密码提示问题答案，则成员资格提供程序会引发 。If a password answer is required and an incorrect password answer is supplied, a is thrown by the membership provider. 如果 `false`，则成员资格提供程序将返回一个异常。If is `false`, the membership provider will return an exception. 如果提供程序支持 为 的密码，则您将无法检索成员资格用户的密码，应考虑在用户忘记其密码时使用 方法。If the provider supports passwords with a of , you will be unable to retrieve the password for the membership user and should consider making use of the method when a user has forgotten his or her password. > [!NOTE] > 如果 `enablePasswordRetrieval` 设置为 `true`，并在 ASP.NET 应用程序的 web.config 文件中 `passwordFormat` 设置为 `Hashed`，则会引发 。A will be thrown if `enablePasswordRetrieval` is set to `true` and `passwordFormat` is set to `Hashed` in the Web.config file for the ASP.NET application. 如果 `false`，则可以为 `answer` 参数提供 `null`，或使用不带任何参数的 重载。If is `false`, you can supply `null` for the `answer` parameter, or use the overload that does not take any parameters. ## Examples 下面的代码示例调用 方法，以便在提供正确的密码答案时检索指定用户名的密码。The following code example calls the method to retrieve the password for a specified user name if the correct password answer is supplied. 密码将发送到用户的电子邮件地址。The password is sent to the user's email address. > [!NOTE] > 对于需要高安全级别的站点，不建议使用电子邮件以明文形式返回密码。Returning a password in clear text using email is not recommended for sites that require a high level of security. 对于高安全性站点，建议使用加密（如 SSL）返回密码。For high-security sites, it is recommended that you return passwords using encryption, such as SSL. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个文本框，该文本框接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.MembershipUser#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.MembershipUser/CS/retrievepasswordcs.aspx#4)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.MembershipUser#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.MembershipUser/VB/retrievepasswordvb.aspx#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当在 内达到 时，用户通常被锁定，并且不能由 方法进行验证。Users are most commonly locked out and cannot be validated by the method when the is reached within the . 如果使用接受密码答案的 或 重载，并且用户输入的错误答案的数目达到 中的 ，则用户也可以被锁定。Users can also be locked out if you use the or overload that accepts a password answer and the number of bad answers entered by the user reaches the within the . 若要将此属性设置为 `false` 并让用户再次尝试登录，可以使用 方法。To set this property to `false` and let the user try to log in again, you can use the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果当前日期和时间减去 属性值早于用户 ，则该用户被视为处于联机状态。A user is considered online if the current date and time minus the property value is earlier than the for the user. 用户的 将按 、 和 方法更新为当前日期和时间，并且可以通过 方法的某些重载进行更新。The for a user is updated to the current date and time by the , and methods, and can be updated by some of the overloads of the method. > [!NOTE] > 当从数据源检索或设置用户数据时，将由 中的类和 命名空间更新用户的 属性值。The property value for a user is updated by the classes in the and the namespaces whenever user data is retrieved from or set at the data source. 如果你的应用程序使用相同的数据源来存储用户信息，并且你的 和 使用与 相同的 `applicationName` 进行配置，则该用户的 和 属性将反映此行为。If your application uses the same data source to store user information, and your and are configured with the same `applicationName` as your , then the and properties of the user will reflect this behavior. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示 控件中的所有成员身份用户名，并使用标签显示选定用户名的特定成员身份信息，包括成员资格用户的 属性值。The following code example displays all membership user names in a control and uses labels to show specific membership information for the selected user name, including the property value for the membership user. remarks.format: ## Remarks 用户的 将按 和 方法更新为当前日期和时间，并且可以通过 方法的某些重载进行更新。The for a user is updated to the current date and time by the and methods, and can be updated by some overloads of the method. 您可以使用 方法将 属性设置为特定的日期和时间。You can use the method to set the property to a specific date and time. 用于确定用户是否处于联机状态。The is used to determine whether a user is online. 如果当前日期和时间减去 属性值早于用户 ，则该用户被视为处于联机状态。A user is considered online if the current date and time minus the property value is earlier than the for the user. 将 、、和 日期设置为通过 方法创建成员资格用户的日期和时间。The sets the , , , and date to the same date and time when a membership user is created by the method. > [!NOTE] > 当从数据源检索或设置用户数据时， 中的类和 命名空间中的类将更新用户的 。The for a user is updated by the classes in the and the namespaces whenever user data is retrieved from or set at the data source. 如果你的应用程序使用相同的数据源来存储用户信息，并且你的 和 使用与 相同的 `applicationName` 进行配置，则该用户的 和 属性将反映此行为。If your application uses the same data source to store user information, and your and are configured with the same `applicationName` as your , then the and properties of the user will reflect this behavior. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示 控件中的所有成员身份用户名，并使用标签显示选定用户名的特定成员身份信息，包括成员资格用户的 属性值。The following code example displays all membership user names in a control and uses labels to show specific membership information for the selected user name, including the property value for the membership user. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 在 中时，用户通常会被锁定。Users are most commonly locked out when the is reached within the . 如果使用接受密码答案的 或 重载，并且用户输入的错误答案的数目达到 中的 ，则用户也可以被锁定。Users can also be locked out if you use the or overload that accepts a password answer and the number of bad answers entered by the user reaches the within the . 属性的默认值由成员资格提供程序确定。The default value for the property is determined by the membership provider. 例如，使用 提供程序创建成员资格用户时，该用户的 属性最初设置为01/01/1754。For example, when a membership user is created using the provider, the property for the user is initially set to 01/01/1754.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将 、、和 日期设置为通过 方法创建成员资格用户的日期和时间。The sets the , , , and date to the same date and time when a membership user is created by the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示一个登录页，该页面指示密码在指定的天数后过期。The following code example shows a login page that indicates a password has expired after a specified number of days. 如果 早于当前日期和时间减去为密码过期指定的天数，则会将该用户定向到更改其密码。If the is earlier than the current date and time minus the number of days specified for the expiration of a password, then the user is directed to change his or her password. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个文本框，该文本框接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `true`，则必须向 和 方法提供成员资格用户的密码提示问题答案。If is `true`, then the password answer for a membership user must be supplied to the and methods. 用作其密码答案的成员资格用户的提醒。The serves as a reminder to the membership user of what his or her password answer is. 成员资格用户提供密码答案后，可以向 或 方法提供答案值。Once the membership user has supplied a password answer, the answer value can be supplied to the or method. ## Examples 如果用户提供了相应的密码提示问题答案，则下面的代码示例将重置用户的密码。The following code example resets a user's password if he or she supplies the appropriate password answer. 用户的 将显示为密码答案用户的提醒。The for the user is displayed as a reminder to the user of the password answer. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个文本框，该文本框接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性公开用于管理 的信息的成员资格提供程序的名称。The property exposes the name of the membership provider that manages the information for the . 您可以通过使用 类的 属性访问成员资格用户的特定成员资格提供程序实例，无论该访问接口是否为该应用程序的默认提供程序。You can access the specific membership provider instance for a membership user by using the property of the class, whether or not the provider is the default provider for the application. 例如，你可以创建一个方法，该方法采用 对象作为输入，并根据业务逻辑更新 。For example, you may create a method that takes a object as input and updates the based on your business logic. 可以通过从 属性值编制索引的 集合调用成员资格提供程序的 方法来确保使用适当的成员资格提供程序来更新 。You can ensure that the appropriate membership provider is used to update the by calling the method of the membership provider from the collection that is indexed by the property value.

summary.span: 将用户密码重置为自动生成的新密码。

span.span: Resets a user's password to a new, automatically generated password.

returns.span: 成员资格用户的新密码。

span.span: The new password for the membership user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用 属性引用的成员资格提供程序的 方法，以将成员资格用户的密码重置为自动生成的新密码。 calls the method of the membership provider referenced by the property to reset the password for the membership user to a new, automatically generated password. 然后，新密码将返回到调用方。The new password is then returned to the caller. 如果 `false`，则成员资格提供程序将返回一个异常。If is `false`, the membership provider will return an exception. 如果 `true`，则必须使用将密码答案作为参数的 重载，并为成员资格用户提供密码答案。If is `true`, you must use the overload that takes a password answer as a parameter and supply the password answer for the membership user. 如果需要密码答案并且提供了不正确的密码提示问题答案，则成员资格提供程序会引发 。If a password answer is required and an incorrect password answer is supplied, a is thrown by the membership provider. ## Examples 下面的代码示例重置用户的密码并返回自动生成的新密码。The following code example resets a user's password and returns the new, automatically generated password. 请注意，假定 为 `false`。Note that is assumed to be `false`. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个文本框，该文本框接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.MembershipUser#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.MembershipUser/CS/ResetPassword2cs.aspx#6)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.MembershipUser#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.MembershipUser/VB/ResetPassword2vb.aspx#6)]

span.span: To prevent this exception, override the method, or change the application to target the full version of the .NET Framework.

summary.span: 将用户密码重置为自动生成的新密码。

span.span: Resets a user's password to a new, automatically generated password.

returns.span: 成员资格用户的新密码。

span.span: The new password for the membership user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用 属性引用的成员资格提供程序的 方法，以将成员资格用户的密码重置为自动生成的新密码。 calls the method of the membership provider referenced by the property to reset the password for the membership user to a new, automatically generated password. 然后，新密码将返回到调用方。The new password is then returned to the caller. 如果 `false`，则成员资格提供程序将返回一个异常。If is `false`, the membership provider will return an exception. 如果 `false`，则可以为 `answer` 参数提供 `null`，或使用不带任何参数的 重载。If is `false`, you can supply `null` for the `answer` parameter, or use the overload that does not take any parameters. 如果需要密码答案并且提供了不正确的密码提示问题答案，则成员资格提供程序会引发 。If a password answer is required and an incorrect password answer is supplied, a is thrown by the membership provider. ## Examples 下面的代码示例重置用户的密码并返回自动生成的新密码。The following code example resets a user's password and returns the new, automatically generated password. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个文本框，该文本框接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). summary.span: 清除用户锁定状态，以便验证成员资格用户。

span.span: Clears the locked-out state of the user so that the membership user can be validated.

returns.span: 如果成功解除成员资格用户的锁定，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the membership user was successfully unlocked; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当在 内达到 时，用户通常被锁定，并且不能由 方法进行验证。Users are most commonly locked out and cannot be validated by the method when the is reached within the . 如果使用接受密码答案的 或 重载，并且用户输入的错误答案的数目达到了 中 的值，则还可以锁定用户。Users can also be locked out if you use the or overload that accepts a password answer and the number of bad answers entered by the user reaches the value of within the . 此方法的实现应将 属性设置为 `false`，将 属性设置为当前日期，并重置用于跟踪尝试中的失败日志数等的所有计数器。Your implementation of this method should set the property to `false`, set the property to the current date, and reset any counters that you use to track the number of failed log in attempts and so forth.

summary.span: 获取成员身份用户的登录名。

span.span: Gets the logon name of the membership user.

value.span: 成员身份用户的登录名。

span.span: The logon name of the membership user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 成员资格用户的 与成员资格用户的密码结合使用来对成员资格用户进行身份验证。A membership user's is used in conjunction with the membership user's password to authenticate the membership user. 的 标识每个使用 进行身份验证的应用程序的唯一用户。The of a identifies a unique user for each application that uses for authentication. 应用程序由成员身份 标识。An application is identified by the membership . 同一用户名可用于不同用户的多个应用程序。The same user name can be used in multiple applications for different users. 或者，可以使用单个用户名标识多个应用程序的用户，前提是将应用程序配置为具有相同的 。Alternatively, a single user name can be used to identify a user for multiple applications, provided the applications are configured with the same . 可以通过将用户名传递到 方法的重载之一，或从 、或 方法返回的 成员，来检索成员资格用户的 对象。You can retrieve a object for a membership user by passing the user name to one of the overloads of the method, or as a member of a returned from the , , or method. 如果用户的电子邮件地址已知，则可以使用 方法检索成员资格用户的用户名。You can retrieve the user name for a membership user if the email address for the user is known, by using the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将应用程序中所有成员资格用户的 属性绑定到 控件，并使用标签显示选定用户名的特定成员身份信息。The following code example binds the property of all the membership users in an application to a control and uses labels to show specific membership information for a selected user name. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection/CS/itemcs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection/VB/itemvb.aspx#2)]

span.span: Introduction to ASP.NET Membership
